entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
